name: Dark Mode for lifewire.com
description: Just some quick css for this website, feel free to improve and publish this as your own.

user.name: Fighter169mobile
user.about:
I usually make dark modes here. Used to post a lot of styles before the pandemic.

I also use userstyles.world, an improved version of this website: https://userstyles.world/user/frostynick

If anything on my dark styles is missing, send me a message. (preferably by email)

additional_info: v0.2 - Second update. Fixes a header title and social media borders. This dark mode isn't really updated much.. feel free to improve this.
